original_text: I know that they are a proud people who do not want to obey me. All the time that I have been living among them, they have turned against the Lord. After my death, they will turn against him even more!
korean_text: 내가 너희의 반역함과 목이 곧은 것을 아나니 오늘 내가 살아서 너희와 함께 있어도 너희가 여호와를 거역하였거든 하물며 내가 죽은 후의 일이랴

sentences.original_text: I know that they are a proud people
who do not want to obey me
All the time that I have been living among them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들 가운데 살아온 모든 시간 동안

sentences.original_text: they have turned against the Lord
they will turn against him even more
